Message: i am not doing well today, I am not going to run again

It's okay to feel this way, but let's focus on what you can improve. Every run isn't perfect, and giving up doesn't make things better. How about we break it down into smaller goals? Take deep breaths, regain your composure, and let's try one
I don't feel like running, but missing training will make fell like a failure.

I hear your concerns, and it's natural to have such thoughts. However, remember that progress comes with patience and persistence. Missing one session won't define your journey. Let's walk through the warm-up together, and if at any point you still wish to stop, we'll respect
I am having a lot of pain in my left leg, I am not going to run.

Pain should never be ignored. It's crucial for your wellbeing. Please take some time to rest and seek medical advice if needed. We'll plan a new routine once you're ready to continue without discomfort. Your health comes first.
